title: Doing the Right Thing
description: Have you ever seen someone doing something wrong? What did you do? It is important to do  the right thing, but sometimes it isn't easy. Doing the Right Thing uses real-life situations and fictional characters to help students think through difficult decisions about what is right and what is wrong. The book can also be used to teach students how to determine the main idea and details as well  as how to identify interrogative sentences.
meta: cheating, decide, explains, fair, right, stealing
Main Idea and Details : Determine main idea and details
Interrogative Sentences : Recognize and use interrogative sentences
Question Words : Identify and use question words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
